steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to apply the hanging indent to.
Go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Paragraph' group, click on the 'Paragraph Settings' button.
In the 'Paragraph Settings' dialog box, go to the 'Indentation' section.
Under 'Special', select 'Hanging' from the drop-down menu.
Specify the desired value for the hanging indent in the 'By' field.
Click 'OK' to apply the hanging indent to the selected text.
